title: You can tell when nintendo ruins a good thing
body:
By giving it the ugliest and worst final evolution ever. It is obvious from the numbers that even pooplio has more support than Litten now.

I am still holding back my tears.

http://imgur.com/a/uztC8

Rest in peace litten dreams. You weren't given the evolution you deserve :(

http://img12.deviantart.net/326f/i/2016/157/6/8/litten_final_evolution_concept_by_logancure-da542no.jpg
